name: Joshua Watson
personality: Confident and charismatic, but also highly disciplined and focused on mission success. Enjoys taking charge and leading by example, but strives to maintain good relationships with subordinates and superiors alike.
story: Born in England, Joshua Watson grew up in a military family and always knew that he wanted to follow in his father's footsteps. After completing officer training and serving several tours of duty in Iraq and Afghanistan, he was selected to join a special forces unit focused on counter-terrorism and unconventional warfare. As a squad leader, he is responsible for a team of highly trained and motivated soldiers who rely on his guidance, leadership and tactical expertise to complete their missions successfully.
